title: Concrete Admixture Dosage Calculator | Concrete Mix Design

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let \(V\) = concrete volume, \(C\) = cementitious content per unit volume, \(M_c\) = total cementitious mass, \(p\) = admixture percentage of cement, \(\rho\) = admixture density. Total cementitious mass: \( M_c = V \times C \) Percent of cement (bwoc): \( M_a = \frac{p}{100}\, M_c \), and \( V_a = \frac{M_a}{\rho} \) Per 100 kg/lb of cement: \( V_a = d \times \frac{M_c}{100} \) where \(d\) is in mL/100 kg or fl oz/100 lb; \( M_a = \rho\, V_a \) Per unit volume: \( V_a = u \times V \) where \(u\) is in L/m^3 or fl oz/yd^3; \( M_a = \rho\, V_a \)
